speaker: MISTRESS PAGE
text_entry: SCENE III. A room in the Garter Inn.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Sir, the Germans desire to have three of your

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: horses: the duke himself will be to-morrow at

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: court, and they are going to meet him.

speaker: Host
text_entry: What duke should that be comes so secretly? I hear

speaker: Host
text_entry: not of him in the court. Let me speak with the

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Ay, sir; I'll call them to you.

speaker: Host
text_entry: They shall have my horses; but I'll make them pay;

speaker: Host
text_entry: I'll sauce them: they have had my house a week at

speaker: Host
text_entry: command; I have turned away my other guests: they

speaker: Host
text_entry: must come off; I'll sauce them. Come.
